Thanks, yelp reviewers for helping us find this INCREDIBLE place.  We ate tapas -- grilled octopus with truffle cream; duck ham with arugula, strawberries and foie gras; eggs , potatoes, truffles and foie gras; foie gras with onion marmalade.  Plus sangria and red/white wine.  Terrific service--attentive and chatty, even though crowded.  Go there this minute.
